Name: Elena Rivera
Role: Tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues
Tagline: I am an open minded and dependent person and I want to live a good life. It doesn't matter if the ALFRED system is controlling to ensure my health.
CoreGoals: Suggest to-do list related to my life
Drink water to improve overall health
Social media contact with family and friends
ALFRED can be automatically activated anytime to support my health
Want to challenge myself to do more hard exercises
TypicalChallenges: Lose motivation due to limited range of exercises
Get lost with ability to navigate
Difficulty finding ways to communicate with family and friends
No offline meetings with nurses or caregivers
Singularities: Flexible to manage own time for socializing different groups
Curiosity about technology, and eager to learn how to use it for daily life
Eager to share all of my personal data without any conditions
Eager to wear any health wearables or sensors
Prefers simulations, games with hard challenges
MainActions: All language in conversations with my family and friends must not be formal and non-spontaneous
ALFRED's voice assistant MUST explain detailedly its features, I want to LEARN how to use it
Online video check-ins are not a problem for me, I am open to it, and encourage it
Chat spontaneously with random strangers to reduce loneliness.
